sourcesContent: import React from "react" import { Box, Flex, Stack, VStack, Img, } from '@chakra-ui/react'; import logo from './logo.svg'; import dog from '.' export default function Header() { return ( <> A Passport NFT for your pet Create a profile for your pet and we'll convert your pets information into a personalized NFT you can use to show proof-of-ownership and proof-of-records. ) }
